title: Features
subtitle: All the features you need to track and improve your trading performance.

import.title: CSV Import
import.content: Easily import your trades from a CSV file. Compatible with most trading platforms.

export.title: CSV Export
export.content: Export your filtered data for external analysis or backup.

filters.title: Advanced Filters
filters.content: Filter your trades by account, date, instrument, strategy and much more.

customization.title: Customization
customization.content: Customize your interface: date format, number format, language, timezone, theme and font size.
